DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study investigate effect BI 10773 , hydrochlorothiazide torasemide change serum urine electrolyte . Furthermore pharmacodynamic pharmacokinetic interaction BI 10773 diuretic assess .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacodynamics Pharmacokinetics Empagliflozin Torasemide Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1. male female patient type 2 diabetes
